name: Chou Majin Eiyuuden Wataru: Another Step
storyline:
The story is about a 9-year old boy named Wataru Ikusabe who is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Sokaizan which he is supposed to save.

He also befriends many of the Soukaizan natives, and forms some very strong friendship bonds.
summary: Chou Majin Eiyuuden Wataru: Another Step is a comical 2D RPG based on the TV series of the same title. Battle is rich in variety with three different modes.
